sn23.1:1.2: Atha kho āyasmā rādho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn23.1:2.3: “Rūpe kho, rādha, sati māro vā assa māretā vā yo vā pana mīyati.
sn23.1:2.4: Tasmātiha tvaṁ, rādha, rūpaṁ māroti passa, māretāti passa, mīyatīti passa, rogoti passa, gaṇḍoti passa, sallanti passa, aghanti passa, aghabhūtanti passa.
sn23.1:2.5: Ye naṁ evaṁ passanti te sammā passanti.
sn23.1:2.9: viññāṇe sati māro vā assa māretā vā yo vā pana mīyati.
sn23.1:2.10: Tasmātiha tvaṁ, rādha, viññāṇaṁ māroti passa, māretāti passa, mīyatīti passa, rogoti passa, gaṇḍoti passa, sallanti passa, aghanti passa, aghabhūtanti passa.
sn23.1:2.11: Ye naṁ evaṁ passanti, te sammā passantī”ti.
sn23.1:3.10: “Accayāsi, rādha, pañhaṁ, nāsakkhi pañhassa pariyantaṁ gahetuṁ.
sn23.1:3.11: Nibbānogadhañhi, rādha, brahmacariyaṁ vussati, nibbānaparāyanaṁ nibbānapariyosānan”ti.
sn23.2:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn23.2:1.4: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sattoti vuccatī”ti?
sn23.2:1.5: “Rūpe kho, rādha, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, tatra satto, tatra visatto, tasmā sattoti vuccati.
sn23.2:1.9: viññāṇe yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, tatra satto, tatra visatto, tasmā sattoti vuccati.
sn23.2:2.1: Seyyathāpi, rādha, kumārakā vā kumārikāyo vā paṁsvāgārakehi kīḷanti.
sn23.2:2.2_0: Yāvakīvañca tesu paṁsvāgārakesu avigatarāgā honti avigatacchandā avigatapemā avigatapipāsā
sn23.2:2.2_1: avigatapariḷāhā avigatataṇhā, tāva tāni paṁsvāgārakāni allīyanti keḷāyanti dhanāyanti mamāyanti.
sn23.2:2.3_0: Yato ca kho, rādha, kumārakā vā kumārikāyo vā tesu paṁsvāgārakesu vigatarāgā honti
sn23.2:2.3_1: vigatacchandā vigatapemā vigatapipāsā vigatapariḷāhā vigatataṇhā, atha kho tāni paṁsvāgārakāni
sn23.2:2.3_2: hatthehi ca pādehi ca vikiranti vidhamanti viddhaṁsenti vikīḷaniyaṁ karonti.
sn23.2:2.4: Evameva kho, rādha, tumhepi rūpaṁ vikiratha vidhamatha viddhaṁsetha vikīḷaniyaṁ karotha taṇhākkhayāya paṭipajjatha.
sn23.2:2.5: Vedanaṁ vikiratha vidhamatha viddhaṁsetha vikīḷaniyaṁ karotha taṇhākkhayāya paṭipajjatha.
sn23.2:2.7: saṅkhāre vikiratha vidhamatha viddhaṁsetha vikīḷaniyaṁ karotha taṇhākkhayāya paṭipajjatha.
sn23.2:2.8: Viññāṇaṁ vikiratha vidhamatha viddhaṁsetha vikīḷaniyaṁ karotha taṇhākkhayāya paṭipajjatha.
sn23.3:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn23.3:1.4: Katamā nu kho, bhante, bhavanetti, katamo bhavanettinirodho”ti?
sn23.3:1.5: “Rūpe kho, rādha, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā—
sn23.4:1.2: Āyasmā rādho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ rādhaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn23.4:2.1: “Pariññeyye ca, rādha, dhamme desessāmi pariññañca pariññātāviṁ puggalañca.
sn23.4:2.2: Taṁ suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn23.4:2.3: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā rādho bhagavato paccassosi.
sn23.4:2.6: Rūpaṁ kho, rādha, pariññeyyo dhammo, vedanā pariññeyyo dhammo, saññā pariññeyyo dhammo, saṅkhārā pariññeyyo dhammo, viññāṇaṁ pariññeyyo dhammo.
sn23.4:2.9: Yo kho, rādha, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo—
sn23.5:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ rādhaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn23.5:1.6: Ye hi keci, rādha, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti;
sn23.5:1.7_0: na me te, rādha, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu vā samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu vā brāhmaṇasammatā,
sn23.5:1.7_1: na ca pana te āyasmanto sāmaññatthaṁ vā brahmaññatthaṁ vā diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā
sn23.5:1.8: Ye ca kho keci, rādha, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānanti;
sn23.5:1.9_0: te kho me, rādha, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu ceva samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu ca
sn23.5:1.9_1: brāhmaṇasammatā, te ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamme
sn23.6:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ rādhaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn23.6:1.6: Ye hi keci, rādha, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti …pe…
sn23.7:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ rādhaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn23.7:1.6: Yato kho, rādha, ariyasāvako imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti—
sn23.7:1.7: ayaṁ vuccati, rādha, ariyasāvako sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti.
sn23.8:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ rādhaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn23.8:1.6: Yato kho, rādha, bhikkhu imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ viditvā anupādāvimutto hoti—
sn23.8:1.7: ayaṁ vuccati, rādha, bhikkhu arahaṁ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto”ti.
sn23.9:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ rādhaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn23.9:1.3: “rūpe kho, rādha, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, taṁ pajahatha.
sn23.9:1.4: Evaṁ taṁ rūpaṁ pahīnaṁ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammaṁ.
sn23.9:1.5: Vedanāya yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, taṁ pajahatha.
sn23.9:1.6: Evaṁ sā vedanā pahīnā bhavissati ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
sn23.9:1.8: saṅkhāresu yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, taṁ pajahatha.
sn23.9:1.9: Evaṁ te saṅkhārā pahīnā bhavissanti ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
sn23.9:1.10: Viññāṇe yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, taṁ pajahatha.
sn23.9:1.11: Evaṁ taṁ viññāṇaṁ pahīnaṁ bhavissati …pe… anuppādadhamman”ti.
sn23.10:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ rādhaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn23.10:1.3: “rūpe kho, rādha, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā, te pajahatha.
sn23.10:1.4: Evaṁ taṁ rūpaṁ pahīnaṁ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammaṁ.
sn23.10:1.5: Vedanāya yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā, te pajahatha.
sn23.10:1.6: Evaṁ sā vedanā pahīnā bhavissati ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
sn23.10:1.8: saṅkhāresu yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā, te pajahatha.
sn23.10:1.9: Evaṁ te saṅkhārā pahīnā bhavissanti ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
sn23.10:1.10: Viññāṇe yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā, te pajahatha.
sn23.10:1.11: Evaṁ taṁ viññāṇaṁ pahīnaṁ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhamman”ti.
sn23.11:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn23.11:1.5: “Rūpaṁ kho, rādha, māro, vedanā māro, saññā māro, saṅkhārā māro, viññāṇaṁ māro.
sn23.11:1.6: Evaṁ passaṁ, rādha, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi nibbindati, saññāyapi nibbindati, saṅkhāresupi nibbindati, viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati.
sn23.11:1.7: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn23.11:1.8: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn23.12:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn23.12:1.5: “Rūpaṁ kho, rādha, māradhammo, vedanā māradhammo, saññā māradhammo, saṅkhārā māradhammo, viññāṇaṁ māradhammo.
sn23.13:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn23.13:1.5: “Rūpaṁ kho, rādha, aniccaṁ, vedanā aniccā, saññā aniccā, saṅkhārā aniccā, viññāṇaṁ aniccaṁ.
sn23.14:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn23.14:1.5: “Rūpaṁ kho, rādha, aniccadhammo, vedanā aniccadhammo, saññā aniccadhammo, saṅkhārā aniccadhammo, viññāṇaṁ aniccadhammo.
sn23.15:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn23.15:1.5: “Rūpaṁ kho, rādha, dukkhaṁ, vedanā dukkhā, saññā dukkhā, saṅkhārā dukkhā, viññāṇaṁ dukkhaṁ.
sn23.16:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn23.16:1.5: “Rūpaṁ kho, rādha, dukkhadhammo, vedanā dukkhadhammo, saññā dukkhadhammo, saṅkhārā dukkhadhammo, viññāṇaṁ dukkhadhammo.
sn23.17:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn23.17:1.5: “Rūpaṁ kho, rādha, anattā, vedanā anattā, saññā anattā, saṅkhārā anattā, viññāṇaṁ anattā.
sn23.18:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn23.18:1.5: “Rūpaṁ kho, rādha, anattadhammo, vedanā anattadhammo, saññā anattadhammo, saṅkhārā anattadhammo, viññāṇaṁ anattadhammo.
sn23.19:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn23.19:1.5: “Rūpaṁ kho, rādha, khayadhammo, vedanā khayadhammo, saññā khayadhammo, saṅkhārā khayadhammo, viññāṇaṁ khayadhammo.
sn23.20:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn23.20:1.5: “Rūpaṁ kho, rādha, vayadhammo, vedanā vayadhammo, saññā vayadhammo, saṅkhārā vayadhammo, viññāṇaṁ vayadhammo.
sn23.21:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn23.21:1.5: “Rūpaṁ kho, rādha, samudayadhammo, vedanā samudayadhammo, saññā samudayadhammo, saṅkhārā samudayadhammo, viññāṇaṁ samudayadhammo.
sn23.22:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn23.22:1.5: “Rūpaṁ kho, rādha, nirodhadhammo, vedanā nirodhadhammo, saññā nirodhadhammo, saṅkhārā nirodhadhammo, viññāṇaṁ nirodhadhammo.
sn23.23:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn23.23:1.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṁ desetu, yamahaṁ bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn23.23:2.1: “Yo kho, rādha, māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo.
sn23.23:2.3: Rūpaṁ kho, rādha, māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo.
sn23.23:2.4: Vedanā māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23.23:2.5: saññā māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23.23:2.6: saṅkhārā māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23.23:2.7: viññāṇaṁ māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23.23:2.8: yo kho, rādha, māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo”ti.
sn23.24:1.1: “Yo kho, rādha, māradhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo …pe….
sn23.33:1.1: “Yo kho, rādha, samudayadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo …pe….
sn23.34:1.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṁ desetu, yamahaṁ bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn23.34:2.1: “Yo kho, rādha, nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo.
sn23.34:2.3: Rūpaṁ kho, rādha, nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23.34:2.4: vedanā nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23.34:2.5: saññā nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23.34:2.6: saṅkhārā nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23.34:2.7: viññāṇaṁ nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23.34:2.8: yo kho, rādha, nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo”ti.
sn23.35:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ rādhaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn23.35:1.3: “yo kho, rādha, māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo.
sn23.35:1.5: Rūpaṁ kho, rādha, māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23.35:1.6: viññāṇaṁ māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn23.35:1.7: yo kho, rādha, māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo”ti.
sn23.36:1.1: “Yo kho, rādha, māradhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo …pe….
sn23.45:1.1: “Yo kho, rādha, samudayadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo …pe….
sn23.46:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ rādhaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn23.46:1.3: “yo kho, rādha, nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo.
sn23.46:1.5: Rūpaṁ kho, rādha, nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo.
sn23.46:1.9: viññāṇaṁ nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo.
sn23.46:1.10: Yo kho, rādha, nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo”ti.
